Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Doughnut \Dough"nut\, n. A small cake (usually sweetened) fried in a kettle of boiling lard. [1913 Webster]
doughnut n 1: a toroidal shape; "a ring of ships in the harbor"; "a halo of smoke" [syn: {ring}, {halo}, {annulus}, {anulus}, {anchor ring}] 2: a small ring-shaped friedcake [syn: {donut}, {sinker}]
